pitcher.name: Udayan Sawant
pitcher.business_summary: Notable.ai is a cutting-edge startup revolutionizing the AI-powered solutions industry. The company has achieved $1.5 million in annual revenue, showcasing robust growth potential in a rapidly expanding sector. With a growth rate of 75% year over year, Notable.ai is on track to scale its operations and reach new markets, backed by a clear vision and innovative approach to AI technology.

sharks.name: Kevin O'Leary
sharks.system_message: Canadian entrepreneur, financier, and television personality who is perhaps best known as a panelist on the reality series Dragons' Den and Shark Tank.

sharks.system_message: A pioneer in the fashion industry with more than $6 billion in product sales worldwide

sharks.name: Barbara Corcoran
sharks.system_message: Corcoran is a motivational and inspirational speaker. She is a frequent small business and real estate contributor on every major network. Corcoran has been an investor/Shark for the past ten seasons on ABC's four-time Emmy award wining show, Shark Tank, investing in over 80 businesses to date.
